verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> some <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> and <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%>

<S%G1223>"Why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do Your <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3845>transgress<s%> the <S%G3862>tradition<s%> of the <S%G4245>elders<s%>? For they do not <S%G3538>wash<s%> their <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2068>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>"

And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, "And <S%G1223>why<s%> <S%G5101><s%> do you <S%G4771>yourselves<s%> <S%G3845>transgress<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of your <S%G3862>tradition<s%>?

"For <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G5091>'Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother,<s%>' and, 'He who <S%G2551>speaks<s%> <S%G2551>evil<s%> of <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> let him be <S%G5053>put<s%> to <S%G2288>death.<s%>'

"But you <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G3739>'Whoever<s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G3004>say<s%> to [his] <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G3739>"Anything<s%> <S%G1437><s%> of <S%G1473>mine<s%> you might have been <S%G5623>helped<s%> by has been <S%G1435>given<s%> [to God,]"

he is not to <S%G5091>honor<s%> his <S%G3962>father<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> his <S%G3384>mother.<s%>' And [thus] you <S%G208>invalidated<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> for the <S%G1223>sake<s%> of your <S%G3862>tradition.<s%>
"You <S%G5273>hypocrites,<s%> <S%G2573>rightly<s%> did <S%G2268>Isaiah<s%> <S%G4395>prophesy<s%> of you, <S%G3004>saying,<s%>
<S%G3778>'This<s%> <S%G2992>people<s%> <S%G5091>honors<s%> Me with their <S%G5491>lips,<s%> But their <S%G2588>heart<s%> is <S%G4206>far<s%> <S%G568>away<s%> from Me.
'But in <S%G3155>vain<s%> do they <S%G4576>worship<s%> Me, <S%G1321>Teaching<s%> as <S%G1319>doctrines<s%> the <S%G1778>precepts<s%> of <S%G444>men.<s%>' "
And after He <S%G4341>called<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to Him, He <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G191>"Hear,<s%> and <S%G4920>understand.<s%>

"Not <S%G3588>what<s%> <S%G1525>enters<s%> into the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the <S%G444>man,<s%> but <S%G3588>what<s%> <S%G1607>proceeds<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2840>defiles<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, "Do You <S%G3609>know<s%> that the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> were <S%G4624>offended<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G3056>statement<s%>?"

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3956>"Every<s%> <S%G5451>plant<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> My <S%G3770>heavenly<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> did not <S%G5452>plant<s%> shall be <S%G1610>rooted<s%> up.

<S%G863>"Let<s%> them <S%G863>alone;<s%> they are <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides<s%> of the <S%G5185>blind.<s%> And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man<s%> <S%G3594>guides<s%> a <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5185>man,<s%> <S%G297>both<s%> will <S%G4098>fall<s%> into a <S%G999>pit.<s%>"
And <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G5419>"Explain<s%> the <S%G3850>parable<s%> to us."
And He <S%G3004>said,<s%> "Are you <S%G188>still<s%> <S%G801>lacking<s%> in <S%G801>understanding<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>?

"Do you not <S%G3539>understand<s%> that <S%G3956>everything<s%> that <S%G1531>goes<s%> into the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G5562>passes<s%> into the <S%G2836>stomach,<s%> and is <S%G1519>eliminated<s%> <S%G856><s%> <S%G1544><s%>?
"But the things that <S%G1607>proceed<s%> out of the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> from the <S%G2588>heart,<s%> and <S%G2548>those<s%> <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>

"For out of the <S%G2588>heart<s%> <S%G1831>come<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts,<s%> <S%G5408>murders,<s%> <S%G3430>adulteries,<s%> <S%G4202>fornications,<s%> <S%G2829>thefts,<s%> <S%G5577>false<s%> <S%G5577>witness,<s%> <S%G988>slanders.<s%>

<S%G3778>"These<s%> are the things which <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man;<s%> but to <S%G2068>eat<s%> with <S%G449>unwashed<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> does not <S%G2840>defile<s%> the <S%G444>man.<s%>"
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>away<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> and <S%G402>withdrew<s%> into the <S%G3313>district<s%> of <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon.<s%>

And <S%G2400>behold,<s%> a <S%G5478>Canaanite<s%> <S%G1135>woman<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out from that <S%G3725>region,<s%> and [began] to <S%G2896>cry<s%> out, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1653>"Have<s%> <S%G1653>mercy<s%> on me, O <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G7035>David;<s%> my <S%G2364>daughter<s%> is <S%G2560>cruelly<s%> demon-possessed."

But He did not <S%G611>answer<s%> her a <S%G3056>word.<s%> And His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to [Him] and kept <S%G2065>asking<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G630>"Send<s%> her <S%G630>away,<s%> for she is <S%G2896>shouting<s%> out <S%G3693>after<s%> us."

But He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I was <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G3756>only<s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to the <S%G622>lost<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> of the <S%G3624>house<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>"
But she <S%G2064>came<s%> and [began] to <S%G4352>bow<s%> <S%G4352>down<s%> <S%G4352>before<s%> Him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G2962>"Lord,<s%> <S%G997>help<s%> me!"
And He <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "It is not <S%G2570>good<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> the children's <S%G740>bread<s%> and <S%G906>throw<s%> it to the <S%G2952>dogs.<s%>"

But she <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> but <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G2952>dogs<s%> <S%G2068>feed<s%> on the <S%G5589>crumbs<s%> which <S%G4098>fall<s%> from their masters' <S%G5132>table.<s%>"

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G3004>said<s%> to her, <S%G5599>"O<s%> <S%G1135>woman,<s%> your <S%G4102>faith<s%> is <S%G3173>great;<s%> be it <S%G1096>done<s%> for you as you <S%G2309>wish.<s%>" And her <S%G2364>daughter<s%> was <S%G2390>healed<s%> at <S%G1565>once.<s%> <S%G5610><s%>

And <S%G3327>departing<s%> from <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G3844>along<s%> by the <S%G2281>Sea<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and having <S%G305>gone<s%> up to the <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> He was <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1563>there.<s%>

And <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitudes<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%> to Him, <S%G2192>bringing<s%> with them [those who were] <S%G5560>lame,<s%> <S%G2948>crippled,<s%> <S%G5185>blind,<s%> <S%G2974>dumb,<s%> and <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2087>others,<s%> and they <S%G4496>laid<s%> them <S%G4496>down<s%> at His <S%G4228>feet;<s%> and He <S%G2323>healed<s%> them,

<S%G5620>so<s%> that the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2296>marveled<s%> as they <S%G991>saw<s%> the <S%G2974>dumb<s%> <S%G2980>speaking,<s%> the <S%G2948>crippled<s%> <S%G5199>restored,<s%> and the <S%G5560>lame<s%> <S%G4043>walking,<s%> and the <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G991>seeing;<s%> and they <S%G1392>glorified<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G2474>Israel.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4341>called<s%> His <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to Him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> "I <S%G4697>feel<s%> <S%G4697>compassion<s%> for the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they have <S%G4357>remained<s%> with Me <S%G2235>now<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> and <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>nothing<s%> <S%G5100><s%> to <S%G2068>eat;<s%> and I do not <S%G2309>wish<s%> to <S%G630>send<s%> them <S%G630>away<s%> <S%G3523>hungry,<s%> <S%G3379>lest<s%> they <S%G1590>faint<s%> on the <S%G3598>way.<s%>"

And the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to Him, <S%G4159>"Where<s%> would we get <S%G5118>so<s%> <S%G5118>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> in a <S%G2047>desolate<s%> <S%G2047>place<s%> to <S%G5526>satisfy<s%> <S%G5118>such<s%> a <S%G5118>great<s%> <S%G3793>multitude<s%>?"

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, <S%G4214>"How<s%> <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> do you <S%G2192>have<s%>?" And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2033>"Seven,<s%> and a <S%G3641>few<s%> <S%G2485>small<s%> <S%G2485>fish.<s%>"
And He <S%G3853>directed<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> to <S%G377>sit<s%> <S%G377>down<s%> on the <S%G1093>ground;<s%>

and He <S%G2983>took<s%> the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> and the <S%G2486>fish;<s%> and <S%G2168>giving<s%> <S%G2168>thanks,<s%> He <S%G2806>broke<s%> them and started <S%G1325>giving<s%> them to the <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> and the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> [in turn,] to the <S%G3793>multitudes.<s%>

And they <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2068>ate,<s%> and were <S%G5526>satisfied,<s%> and they <S%G142>picked<s%> up <S%G3588>what<s%> was <S%G4052>left<s%> <S%G4052>over<s%> of the <S%G2801>broken<s%> <S%G2801>pieces,<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G4711>large<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> <S%G4134>full.<s%>
And <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2068>ate<s%> were <S%G5070>four<s%> <S%G5070>thousand<s%> <S%G435>men,<s%> <S%G5565>besides<s%> <S%G1135>women<s%> and <S%G3813>children.<s%>
And <S%G630>sending<s%> <S%G630>away<s%> the <S%G3793>multitudes,<s%> He <S%G1684>got<s%> into the <S%G4143>boat,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> to the <S%G3725>region<s%> of <S%G3093>Magadan.<s%>
